p: Incidence data of the Zika virus in the United States was collected from the weekly reports published by the CDC. The reports and the associated data were made publicly available by the CDC on GitHub ( https://github.com/cdcepi/zika). The CDC epidemiological reports provide the cumulative number of Zika cases by State, starting from February 24, 2016. Additional case counts of January-February 2016 were extracted from CDC official media releases and included in the dataset.
